Burlington does not have an airport which has commercial service. You need to fly into one of these airports and drive or take a bus to Burlington.

value: Bellingham International Airport: closest airport with commercial service to Burlington but has limited connections. See
for more details. Get to Burlington by going south from the airport on I-5.
Seattle International Airport: South of Seattle, this is the closest main airport. To get to Burlington from the airport, go north on I-5 for about 80 miles to Burlington. See
Vancouver International Airport: Although it lies across the international border, the Airport really isn't that far and can be useful in some occasions. See
Due to a recent bridge collapse along Interstate 5 north of Seattle between

, traffic through those communities may be delayed or detoured as repairs to the bridge are made. There is a 40 mph speed limit throughout the impacted area, including the temporary bridge span. Installation of the new bridge will require another full closure of I-5 in September after Labor Day. Expect lengthy travel delays.

Burlington lies at the intersection of WA-20 and I-5.

value: , take I-5 north about 65 miles (a little more than an hour without traffic) to Burlington.
take BC-99 and I-5 south for about 80 miles to Burlington.

From Eastern Washington: in summer you can take SR-20 (the North Cascades Hwy) across from the Methow Valley area, in winter WA-20 is closed and you must take US-2 or I-90 to the Puget sound area and then drive north to Burlington.

Amtrak Cascades offers service to the
station, which is next to Burlington, to Vancouver and Seattle.
Burlington has recently been overrun by sprawl-type restaurant chains.  But there are still a few quality places to eat.

value: content=The original location of the local family-run Mexican restaurant chain.  They feature fresh ingredients and attention to authenticity from family recipes.
content=Tacos Guaymas is a local's favorite featuring a variety of Mexican restaurant plates, and taqueria dishes.  The burritos are delicious and huge.
content=Cafe Burlington emphasizes local and homemade foods that emphasize the best of what Skagit County has to offer.
content=Japanese steakhouse where the chefs prepare your dish on a hot grill right in front of you.  Also features a sushi bar, and many other Japanese food selections.
